name: Santa Vs Airplane
description:
Let's play amazing game for kids and adults. It's amazing adventure and action endless game play. Tap to fly Santa Airplane and collect the gifts. Create your most score. Also collect the power and much more.

Features:
=======
- Beautiful Christmas Graphics.
- Easy to play.
- Relax your mind.
- Supported IOS 11.

It's amazing game. So are you ready for play? Download Now....
